akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3774. Authorization of appropriations There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this chapter not more than $75,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2025 through 2029. (Pub. L. 109–294, § 5, Oct. 3, 2006, 120 Stat. 1354; Pub. L. 116–9, title VII, § 7001(a), Mar. 12, 2019, 133 Stat. 779; Pub. L. 118–159, div. E, title LIII, § 5302, Dec. 23, 2024, 138 Stat. 2445.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2024—Pub. L. 118–159 substituted “2025 through 2029” for “2019 through 2023”. 2019—Pub. L. 116–9 substituted “2019 through 2023” for “2006 through 2011”.
